name: py-dace

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: counters
variants.description: Optional requirements that enable performance counter collection.

description:
DaCe is a fast parallel programming framework that takes code in
Python/NumPy and other programming languages, and maps it to high-
performance CPU, GPU, and FPGA programs, which can be optimized
programmatically or interactively.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: likwid
dependencies.description:
Likwid is a simple to install and use toolsuite of command line
applications for performance oriented programmers. It works for Intel
and AMD processors on the Linux operating system. This version uses the
perf_event backend which reduces the feature set but allows user
installs. See https://github.com/RRZE-
HPC/likwid/wiki/TutorialLikwidPerf#feature-limitations for information.

dependencies.name: py-aenum
dependencies.description:
Advanced Enumerations (compatible with Python's stdlib Enum),
NamedTuples, and NamedConstants.

dependencies.name: py-astunparse
dependencies.description:
An AST unparser for Python. This is a factored out version of unparse
found in the Python source distribution; under Demo/parser in Python 2
and under Tools/parser in Python 3.

dependencies.name: py-flask
dependencies.description: A simple framework for building complex web applications.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyreadline
dependencies.description: A Python implementation of GNU readline functionality.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-websockets
dependencies.description:
websockets is a library for building WebSocket servers and clients in
Python with a focus on correctness and simplicity.
